newsitem.title: USA: Workgroup Technology says names John McDonough CFO.
newsitem.headline: Workgroup Technology says names John McDonough CFO.

text.p: Workgroup Technology Corp said Wednesday John McDonough has joined the company as vice president of operations and chief financial officer.
The company said McDonough was previoiusly president and chief executive officer of Easel Corp, a $40 million client/server development tools company.
The company was not immediately able to provide further information.
Workgroup said McDonough replaced George McHorney, who left the company in December. A company spokeswoman said she could not say whether he resigned or was laid off.
